html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-00672018-02-02,  ,  ,  TBS,  OAG,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectAppointment of the Joint Auditor of the wholly-owned subsidiaries of the Public Sector Pension Investment Board
PrecisOrder Appointing (a) for each of the following wholly-owned subsidiaries of the PUBLIC SECTOR PENSION INVESTMENT BOARD: i. KPMG AS of Stavanger, Norway, as AUDITOR of Infragas Norge AS for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017; ii. Ernst & Young Audit S.A.S. of Bogotá, Colombia, as AUDITOR of PSPIB Colcondor S.A.S. for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017; iii. Ernst & Young Audit S.A.S. of Bogatá, Colombia, as AUDITOR of PSPIB Losandes S.A.S. for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017; iv. Deloitte LLP of Montréal, Québec, Canada, as AUDITOR of PSPIB-RE Summit Inc. for the fiscal year ending March 31, 2018; v. Deloitte GmbH o Wirtschaftsprüfungsgesellschaft f Düsseldorf, Germany, as AUDITOR of World Airport Partners Management GmbH for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017; vi. Deloitte GmbH Wirtschaftsprüfungsgesellschaft of Düsseldorf, Germany, as AUDITOR of AviAlliance GmbH for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017; vii. Deloitte LLP of Toronto, Ontario, Canada, as AUDITOR of Revera Inc. for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017; viii. PricewaterhouseCoopers of Auckland, New Zealand, as AUDITOR for PSPIB Waiheke Inc. for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017; ix. Ernst & Young of Christchurch, New Zealand, as AUDITOR for Global Herd NZ Limited for the fiscal year ending May 31, 2018; x. KPMG of Sydney, Australia, as AUDITOR for Fitzroy Land Investments Company Pty Ltd for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017; xi. Ernst & Young Audit S.A.S. of Bogotá, Colombia, as AUDITOR for PSPIB Viviendas S.A.S. for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017; xii. Deloitte Brazil of São Paulo, Brazil, as AUDITOR for SAB Platform (Buffalo do Brasil Empreendimentos Imobiliarios Ltda, Buffalo 2 do Brasil Empreendimentos Imobiliarios Ltda.) for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017; xiii.PricewaterhouseCoopers AUDITORes, S.L. of Madrid, Spain, as AUDITOR for Roadis Transportation B.V. for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017; xiv. PricewaterhouseCoopers, S.C. of Mexico City, Mexico, as AUDITOR for Promotora Turistica Rojomar, S. de R.L. de C.V. for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017; xv. PricewaterhouseCoopers, S.C. of Mexico City, Mexico, as AUDITOR for Promotora Atardeceres del Pacifico S. de R.L. de C.V. for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017. xvi. Deloitte LLP of Montréal, Québec, Canada, as AUDITOR for PSP Britannia Ltd for the fiscal year ending March 31, 2018; xvii. Deloitte LLP of Montréal, Québec, Canada, as AUDITOR of PSP Investments Holding Europe Ltd for the fiscal year ending March 31, 2018; xviii. Deloitte Turkey of Istanbul, Turkey, as AUDITOR for Genev Enerji Yatirimi A.S. for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017; xix.Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu of Sydney, Australia, as AUDITOR for WAPT Pty Ltd for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017; xx. Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu of Sydney, Australia, as AUDITOR for PSPIB Uluru Investments Pty Ltd for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017; xxi. Deloitte LLP of Montréal, Québec, Canada as AUDITOR of each wholly-owned subsidiary of the Public Sector Pension Investment Board that has not been appointed an AUDITOR in items i to xx, or in any other Order in Council, for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017; (b) the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR of the wholly-owned subsidiaries of the PUBLIC SECTOR PENSION INVESTMENT BOARD for the fiscal year ending on or before March 31, 2018.
AttachmentsAttachment
